# Tasks & Examples
A user has to be always provide prompt-learner with *task* and *examples*. \ 
A task comprises of the description of the task, the type of task and a valid set of labels for the task(if applicable). \
An example is a data sample for the task and will have a corresponding text and label(if applicable). \
A combination of a well-specified task and examples guides the prompt-learning pipeline. \
